generate(java.util.List<android.support..Description: This method will be called with the @B_android#support#v7#graphics#Palette#Swatch_E@ that represent an image. You should process this list so that you have appropriate values when the other methods in class are called. This method will probably be called on a background thread.

ClassDesc: Extension point for @B_android#support#v7#graphics#Palette_E@ which allows custom processing of the list of @B_android#support#v7#graphics#Palette#Swatch_E@ instances which represent an image. You should do as much processing as possible during the @B_android#support#v7#graphics#Palette#Generator#generate_E@ method call. The other methods in this class may be called multiple times to retrieve an appropriate @B_android#support#v7#graphics#Palette#Swatch_E@. Usage of a custom @B_android#support#v7#graphics#Palette#Generator_E@ is done with @B_android#support#v7#graphics#Palette#Builder#generator_E@ as so:
